channel.title: Handwritten Mailbox
channel.description: Write letter to your old friend or stranger

item.description:
1.6.22

Fixed : Fixed a problem where the text appears too large on some Android phones. It was also issued on other devices, So I changed the structure to show letter. If having a problem with large text, please update it check version 1.6.22

1.6.1

Fixed : A problem where the text appears too large on some Android phones

1.6.0

Fixed : Many bugs have been fixed Fixed an issue where the background music playback stopped when the mailbox was opened Fixed an issue that caused the cloud to rise too late when the cloud notification came Fixed an issue where 1 is not removed when a notification arrives on an iOS device Fixed an issue where in-app purchases were not working properly on some devices

Added : A Textbox button for long messages has been added.

1.5.9

Added : celebration over 100 users now! The first event of Hand Letter Mailbox begins! When you sign up, watch advertisements, and purchase, you will earn double hearts (x2)

1.5.1

Added : Send a cloud message! You can send a cloud message on user’s sky Do it on user’s profile card

1.4.5

Added : Japanese language has been added You can now create a profile card and send a letter directly We made major changes to the hand drawing editor. Now you can receive a push notification when a letter arrives Find promo codes hidden everywhere!

1.2.5

Added : Indonesian language has been added Now you can upload photos right in the editor A tutorial was added

1.1.6

Helllo everyone! this is Mailbox! First release

We are adding a lot of letters, stamps, and stickers. Market registration fee is free during the event period! Please share a lot of your hand drawn arts!!

v1.1.6 : performance improved
